original_text: He pulls the arrow out of his back. His blood makes its sharp point shine brightly. He is very afraid. He pulls the arrow out of his back. His blood makes its sharp point shine brightly. He is very afraid. He pulls the arrow out of his back.
korean_text: 몸에서 그의 화살을 빼낸즉 번쩍번쩍하는 촉이 그의 쓸개에서 나오고 큰 두려움이 그에게 닥치느니라

sentences.original_text: He pulls the arrow out of his back.
His blood makes its sharp point shine brightly.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 피는 날카로운 끝을 밝게 빛나게 합니다.

sentences.original_text: He pulls the arrow out of his back.
His blood makes its sharp point shine brightly.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 피는 날카로운 끝을 밝게 빛나게 합니다.

sentences.original_text: He pulls the arrow out of his back.
